channel.title: info on RamblingWare
channel.description: Recent content in info on RamblingWare

item.title: Back Online After Migrating DBs
item.description:
Maybe you haven't noticed, but its been a few months since my last blog post. The reason being two fold:
I migrated my blog db from MySQL to Cloudant.The WYSIWYG editor on my dashboard wasn't ready.Now that I've got an alpha 1.0.0 version of the dashboard working, I'm finally able to give an update today. Sorry its taken so long, but I don't work on my open source projects every day.

item.title: 2nd Update
item.description: Its been quite a while, since I started my website, and now I'm getting back into things. I've got lots to share, and will be posting more to my other pages. I've added 2 Projects to my Past Projects page. Senior Project and Bookmarks for Bluemix. These pages describe the overall work and results of the project. Their code won't be available for download in the Code page, but I will be adding other items for others to download later.

item.title: First!
item.description: This post marks when I started building my first blog on Wix, a website-generating factory. Ever since I started my blog on their site, I kept getting a nagging feeling, that I wasn't doing it right... I wasn't programming... I was cheating. It felt wrong. I vowed that I would return to program my own website. "What kind of programmer doesn't create their own website?", I thought. if(\"Programmer\".equals(user.getRole()) ){ return user.
